resources.string: Scroll horizontally to see some places specially displayed for you where you may order some food.
Scroll horizontally to see other stores where you may order some food.
Scroll horizontally to see other nearby places where you may order some food.
It is the home icon that takes you to the main page of the app.
It is the cart icon that takes you to the screen where you may see which products you have added to it.
It is the restaurant logo of the last order made.
